textFooter:
Online language learning for everyone.
 Learn a new language in a simple and enjoyable way.
subtitle: Learn with native teachers, innovative methods, and a global community. Speak like a local from day one.

about_description: Hoavi is an edtech startup reinventing language learning by combining online courses, in-person training (from middle to high school), and immersive technologies such as mobile and virtual reality (VR). Our programs are certification-based, allowing each learner to earn verifiable digital certificates and badges that prove real linguistic and professional skills.
p_decouvrez: Discover the key milestones that have marked our growth and success.
lancement: Launch with a small passionate team
fondementaux: The core principles that guide each of our actions and decisions.
h2_vision: Ready to turn your vision into reality?
section_histoire_content: Launched in late August 2025 by a passionate team, Hoavi was born from the ambition to make linguistic and academic education more useful, modern, and accessible. Its goal is to provide practical and certified learning paths that open real academic and career opportunities.
p_rej: Join thousands of clients who trust us with their most ambitious projects.
section_vision_content: Our vision is to become the global reference for a hybrid educational model where learning goes hand in hand with accreditation. Hoavi aligns its programs with international frameworks ‚Äî such as the CEFR for languages ‚Äî recognized by academic partners and companies, preparing learners for real-world and rewarding careers.
section_mission_content: Our mission is to offer personalized, measurable, and certifiable learning paths available online, in person, on mobile, and in VR. We aim to develop transferable skills that combine language mastery with professional know-how. Hoavi issues verifiable certificates through exams, portfolios, and digital badges, and plans to expand its certified courses internationally by 2026.
section_offres_content: Hoavi provides certified language programs with progressive modules, continuous assessments, a final exam, and a CEFR-aligned digital certificate (levels A1‚ÄìC2). In-person courses are part of integrated programs combining internal certificates and partner accreditations. Our technological ecosystem includes a website, a mobile app, and a VR platform. The strategic plan aims for international expansion by 2026, emphasizing quality and accreditation through agreements with universities and recognized organizations.
section_organisation_content: Hoavi‚Äôs organization is built around several complementary departments: a pedagogical team designing and evaluating courses, a Certification & Quality Office responsible for creating frameworks and issuing certificates, an Institutional Relations team managing partnerships and accreditations, and a Tech & Product team handling exams, digital badges, and blockchain-ready verification. The Support & Careers department helps learners leverage their certificates in the professional world.
section_role_content: Hoavi designs, implements, and evaluates certified learning programs while issuing verifiable and recognized credentials. The company supports learners in showcasing their skills, ensuring each certificate becomes a true gateway to employment and career growth.

passwordStrength.title: Password strength
passwordStrength.requirements: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

errors.connectionError: Connection error. Please check your internet connection.

form_f.title: New password
form_f.description: Choose a secure password to protect your account. A good password is essential for your online security.

quote.text: "A good password is like a good key: unique and complex."

security_f.advice: Use a unique password that you don't use anywhere else. Avoid easily guessable personal information.
